existing_features.title: On the main/home page only, when the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, display the current user's Principal ID at the very bottom of the page (footer area).
Add a one-click copy-to-clipboard control next to the displayed Principal ID on the Home page, with user-facing feedback text in English indicating success or failure.

Implement the Principal ID display as an easily removable, clearly isolated UI block (e.g., a small component or guarded block) so it can be deleted in a follow-up update without impacting other footer features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display current user's principal ID on main/home page temporarily, then automatically remove the display after user sends the ID

projectName: Temporarily display logged-in user principal ID on Home page footer
